ICJ to rule on jurisdiction in Russia-Ukraine genocide caseThe United Nations' highest court will rule on Friday whether it will hear a case in which Ukraine has accused Russia of violating international law by saying its invasion was launched to stop an alleged genocide. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 13:24:02 GMT XO3NGQO6SFLTXF5IN6K44PHNNM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/icj-rule-jurisdiction-Russia-ukraine-genocide-case-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Georgian Prime Minister Garibashvili announces his resignationGeorgian Prime Minister Irakli Garibashvili said in a televised briefing on Monday that he was resigning ahead of parliamentary elections due by October. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 13:17:04 GMT MAC5WF5EIVMWDIDI42IIXS5NKM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/georgian-总理-garibashvili-announces-his-resignation-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli intelligence accuses 190 Gaza U.N. staff of Hamas, Islamic Jihad rolesAn Israeli intelligence dossier that prompted a cascade of countries to halt funds for a U.N. Palestinian aid agency includes allegations that some staff took part in abductions and killings during the Oct. 7 raid that sparked the Gaza war. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 13:05:57 GMT 7WPNHGJ25ROJBIYVDTAXKYNSSY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-intelligence-accuses-190-gaza-un-staff-hamas-islamic-jihad-roles-2024-01-29/Dan Williams, Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界中东地区
Russian dissident Kara-Murza transferred to unknown location, wife saysThe wife of Russian dissident Vladimir Kara-Murza said on Monday that he had left the Siberian penal colony where he had been imprisoned since September, and she did not know where the authorities had taken him. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 12:42:35 GMT UEQP4I7ILBJEXGVO4KZ3A6JDXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-dissident-kara-murza-transferred-unknown-location-wife-says-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Why are farmers protesting in France and other parts of Europe?French farmers blocked major highways to Paris on Monday as they pursue protests over a range of grievances, despite several measures announced by the government. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 12:32:07 GMT 4YPRTOU24RP2DJOOXBKYUI6XSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/why-are-french-farmers-protesting-2024-01-29/Gus Trompiz, Sybille Hamaide商业工作世界
Dissident Russian rock band faces deportation from ThailandMembers of a dissident Russian rock band critical of the war in Ukraine are facing possible deportation home from Thailand after they were arrested in the resort island of Phuket for working without a permit, several officials told Reuters on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 12:20:45 GMT XCA2KCL2TFPS5LHWWEFDYBRJSE https://www.reuters.com/world/dissident- Russian-rock-band-faces-deported-to-thailand-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Kate, Princess of Wales, back home after surgeryKate, the Princess of Wales, has returned home from hospital after a two-week stay following abdominal surgery, Kensington Palace said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 12:16:51 GMT ZCDJP2H4ZJPIFDPKMDENQTZDNE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/kate-uks-princess-of-wales-returns-home-after-surgery-2024-01-29/Reuters世界英国
Italy's Meloni seeks new partnership with Africa, funds limitedItalian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni called for a new partnership with Africa on Monday, unveiling a long-awaited plan aimed at boosting economic ties, creating an energy hub for Europe and curbing immigration. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 11:30:24 GMT SV2SMGQEYZI7VPZREXTBAEJR6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-meloni-opens-africa-summit-promises-new-partnership-2024-01-29/Crispian Balmer, Angelo Amante世界欧洲
Iraq condemns deadly attack on U.S. troops in JordanThe Iraqi government on Monday condemned an attack that killed three U.S. service members in Jordan, describing it as part of an escalation which threatens regional stability and urging an end to "the cycle of violence". Mon, 29 Jan 2024 11:26:50 GMT JVXJWZLEVNKRVIDFRREV24S7PE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraq-condemns-deadly-attack-us-troops-jordan-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中东地区
Suspected Israeli attack on Iranian military advisory site in Syria kills two -Iranian mediaTwo people were killed and several wounded on Monday in what Iranian and Syrian media said was an Israeli attack on the outskirts of the Syrian capital, with Iran's ambassador to Damascus denying reports the location was an Iranian military post. Brazil spy probe reaches closer to ex-president Bolsonaro inner circle - sourcesCarlos Bolsonaro, a son of former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro, was targeted by federal police raids in an investigation into suspected illegal spying on political foes. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 11:02:51 GMT XXECX4ZW45OMBOWV4B7B5LS4GQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/bolsonaro-son-targeted-by-brazilian-police-raids-local-media-2024-01-29/Ricardo Brito, Lisandra Paraguassu世界美洲
